attributes.action: Ensure that ships of the Royal Navy are not named after living people unless that name has a tradition within the Royal Navy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Navy has a tradition of naming ships that should not be compromised by naming a ship after a living person. Note that the names for the proposed aircraft carriers, HMS Queen Elizabeth and HMS Prince of Wales are traditional names for ships of the Royal Navy.
